de.dezibel.data

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dezibel.data.Application

  • public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the application from an artist for a label and vice versa.
    Author:
    Henner
    Invariant:
    self.text != null && self.creationDate != null && self.label != null && self.artist != null

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private User artist 
      private java.util.Date creationDate 
      private boolean fromArtist 
      private Label label 
      private boolean markedForDeletion 
      private java.lang.String text 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Application(boolean fromArtist, java.lang.String text, User artist, Label label)
      Creates a new application object representing an application from an artist for a label if fromArtist is set to true or the other way around if it's set to false.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Application

        public Application(boolean fromArtist,
           java.lang.String text,
           User artist,
           Label label)
        Creates a new application object representing an application from an artist for a label if fromArtist is set to true or the other way around if it's set to false.
        Parameters:
        fromArtist - Set to true if the applicant is an artist, otherwise false.
        text - The message written by the applicant.
        artist - The artist who applies or receives an application.
        label - The label that applies or receives an application.

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        public void accept()
        Accept the application. (Notify both the label and the artist.)

      • decline

        public void decline()
        Decline the application. (Notify the application's creator of declination.)

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Delete this application object and clear all of its associations.

      • isFromArtist

        public boolean isFromArtist()
        Returns true if this application was written by an artist and false otherwise.
        Returns:
        True if the applicant is an artist, false if the applicant is a label.
        Precondition:
        true
        Postcondition:
        self.fromArtist = self.fromArtistAtPre

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()

      • getCreationDate

        public java.util.Date getCreationDate()

      • getLabel

        public Label getLabel()

      • getUser

        public User getUser()

      • isMarkedForDeletion

        public boolean isMarkedForDeletion()
        Returns true if this application is marked for deletion, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if this application is marked for deletion else false
